2025-05-29 20:27:48.266 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (32ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c
    JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid=c.relnamespace
    WHERE n.nspname='public' AND
          c.relname='__EFMigrationsHistory'
)

SELECT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c
    JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid=c.relnamespace
    WHERE n.nspname='public' AND
          c.relname='__EFMigrationsHistory'
)

CREATE TABLE "__EFMigrationsHistory" (
    "MigrationId" character varying(150) NOT NULL,
    "ProductVersion" character varying(32) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK___EFMigrationsHistory" PRIMARY KEY ("MigrationId")
);
2025-05-29 20:27:48.372 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_class c
    JOIN pg_catalog.pg_namespace n ON n.oid=c.relnamespace
    WHERE n.nspname='public' AND
          c.relname='__EFMigrationsHistory'
)
2025-05-29 20:27:48.379 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "MigrationId", "ProductVersion"
FROM "__EFMigrationsHistory"
ORDER BY "MigrationId";
2025-05-29 20:27:48.390 +07:00 [INF] Applying migration '20250529132744_InitialCreate'.
2025-05-29 20:27:48.420 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "AlertRules" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Name" character varying(200) NOT NULL,
    "Type" character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    "Condition" character varying(500) NOT NULL,
    "Severity" character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    "IsActive" boolean NOT NULL,
    "CreatedAt" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
    "UpdatedAt" timestamp with time zone DEFAULT (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
    "CreatedBy" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    "UpdatedBy" character varying(100),
    "Description" character varying(1000),
    CONSTRAINT "PK_AlertRules" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
2025-05-29 20:27:48.428 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
CREATE TABLE "Alerts" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Type" character varying(50) NOT NULL,
    "Severity" character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    "Title" character varying(200) NOT NULL,
    "Message" character varying(1000) NOT NULL,
    "Data" text,
    "Source" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    "IsResolved" boolean NOT NULL,
    "CreatedAt" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
    "ResolvedAt" timestamp with time zone,
    "ResolvedBy" character varying(100),
    "Resolution" character varying(1000),
    "RelatedEntityType" character varying(100),
    "RelatedEntityId" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Alerts" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
2025-05-29 20:27:48.433 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

2025-05-29 20:27:48.465 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT setval(
    pg_get_serial_sequence('"AlertRules"', 'Id'),
    GREATEST(
        (SELECT MAX("Id") FROM "AlertRules") + 1,
        nextval(pg_get_serial_sequence('"AlertRules"', 'Id'))),
    false);
2025-05-29 20:27:48.471 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

VALUES ('20250529132744_InitialCreate', '8.0.0');
